overview: In the face of pain and loss comes the joy of inheritance for Angelika Grays and the discovery of her new stepsister, Marie Berger, a girl who is about to embark on a journey of sexual discovery as she takes over her father s empire and begins a new life of pleasures and luxuries that most of us could only ever imagine. With her new lifestyle full of yachts, mansions, luxury cars, butlers and private drivers, Marie is accompanied by her friend, the always sexy Geishakyd, as she discovers all the sexual wonders the world has to offer in our latest super production and one of Private s best movies yet! Private Gold, The Heiress, don t miss it!
title: The Heiress
